pages.text: 26|207|kyoraku sa sete moratta koto ga, kare-ra ni tori nani no eki ni narou ka.
26|208|Ware wa keikoku-sha o (maemotte) tsukawasazu ni ikan naru machi mo horobosanakatta.
26|209|(Mata) kidzuka se (ta nochi de) nakereba. Ware wa kesshite futona koto o okonau monode wanai.
26|210|Mata akuma-tachi ga kore (keiji) o motarasu koto mo nai nodearu.
26|211|Sore wa kare-ra ni fusawashi monode mo naku, mata kare-ra ni wa (son'na) noryoku mo nai.
26|212|Kare-ra wa, keiji o kiku koto kara tozake rarete iru.
26|213|Sore de arra to issho ni,-gai no don'na kami ni mo inotte wa naranai.-Sa mo nai to anata mo chobatsu sa reru mono no nakama to narou.
26|214|Anata no kinshin-sha ni chikai Tsuge shi nasai.
26|215|Mata anata ni shitagatte shinko suru mono ni wa,(ai no) tsubasa o yasashiku sagete yari nasai.
26|216|Kare-ra ga anata ni shitagawanainara,`anata gata ga okonau koto wa, watashi ni kakawari wa arimasen.' To itte yaru ga i.
26|217|Iryoku narabinaku jihibukaki okata ni (ato wa) o makase shi nasai.
26|218|Anata ga (reihai ni) tatsu no o mite ora reru kata ni,
26|219|mata sajida suru mono-tachi no ma de no, anata no sho dosa o (mo mite ora reru kata ni).
26|220|Hontoni kare wa zen Akira ni shite zenchi de ara reru.
26|221|Ware wa, akuma-tachi ga dare no ue ni kudaru no ka anata gata ni tsugeyou ka.
26|222|Kare-ra wa, subete no uso-tsuki no to no ue ni kudaru.
26|223|(Akuma no hanashi ni) mimiwokasu (-sha) no oku wa uso-tsuki no todearu.
26|224|Mata shijin-tachi no kotodaga,(akuma ni) 唆 Ka sa reta-sha-tachi (dake) ga, kare-ra ni shitagau.
26|225|Anata wa, kare-ra ga subete no tanima o samayoi aruku no o minakatta no ka.
26|226|Mata kare-ra wa, jibun no okonai mo shinai koto o kuchi ni surude wanai ka.

26|227|Shinko shite zenko ni isoshimu mono, mata arra o oku 唱念 Shi, hakugai sa reta nochi ni wa mizukara o mamoru mono wa betsudearu. Fugi o itta-sha-tachi wa, don'na kawari-kata de, utsurikawatte iku ka o, yagate shiru koto ni narou.
